text: Andrew Elborn Clements (May 29, 1949 – November 28, 2019) was an American children's writer. His first book Frindle won annual book awards. In June 2015 it was named the Phoenix Award winner for 2016. He also wrote A Week in the Woods and Things Not Seen. Clements died on November 28, 2019 at his Baldwin, Maine home at the age of 70.Maine Author Behind Children’s Classic ‘Frindle’ Has Passed Away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American children's writers Category:American novelists Category:Writers from Bangor, Maine Category:Writers from Camden, New Jersey Category:Writers from Springfield, Illinois
title: Andrew Clements
